name: Office Scene (Darren Hogan)
description:
Controls

  • Movement - W,A,S,D
  • Action - E

This is the first game scene I made in Unity as part of my Second year final assignment in college. Models and animations were made using 3DS Max and textured in Photoshop. The scene was made to replicate a modern office setting. Office furniture and layouts were researched and made.
